summary: Inspired by Churchill's Dunkirk speech, brash, undisciplined bush pilot Brian MacLean and three friends enlist in the RCAF but are deemed too old to be fliers.
cast: James Cagney|Dennis Morgan|Brenda Marshall|Alan Hale|George Tobias|Reginald Gardiner|W.A. Bishop|Reginald Denny|Russell Arms|Paul Cavanagh|Clem Bevans|J.M. Kerrigan|J. Anthony Hughes|Jack Hyde|Ellis Irving|Charles Irwin|John Kellogg|Frank Lackteen|Harry Lewis|Miles Mander|Anthony Marsh|Edward McNamara|Harold Miller|Ray Montgomery|Will Morgan|Gavin Muir|George Offerman Jr.|George Ovey|Henry Rowland|Harry Seymour|Charles Smith|Sergeant-Major Spratt|James Stevens|Emmett Vogan|Russell Wade|Billy Wayne|Frank Wilcox|William Wilkerson|Larry Williams|Flying Officer Willis
title: Capitanes de las nubes
